text: Tommy Wiseau () is an American actor and filmmaker. He produced and directed The Room (2003). It has been described by many critics as "one of the worst movies ever made". Wiseau also directed the 2004 documentary Homeless in America and the 2015 sitcom The Neighbors.Tommy Wiseau: The Complete Interview(s), The Portland Mercury; accessed June 1, 2017. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Polish movie directors Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:American movie actors Category:Polish movie actors Category:Writers from Poznań Category:Actors from Poznań Category:Actors from New Orleans
title: Tommy Wiseau
